hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Thieves' Hideout# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Bottom of the Well# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say Ganondorf's bolts can be reflected with glass or steel.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Bottom

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #the Shadow Temple Boss Key#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Bottom of the Well#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##the Haunted Wasteland## has #0# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #a Red Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Arrows (30 pieces)# can be found at #Zora's River#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals #Wolfos# guarding a chest.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: I hear Termina is a great spot for a vacation!

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Ganon's Tower#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #a Deku Stick#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #inside Ganon's Castle#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Arrows (30 pieces)# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #a Blue Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Requiem of Spirit# can be found at #Zora's River#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #the Fire Temple# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Fire Temple Boss Key# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Goron Ruby#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Green Rupee# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

SFM (Maze Upper).text: What do you call a group of Gorons?^${12 39 C7}A rock band.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #0# major items.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Bottom

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Goron Ruby#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Ice Cavern# corridors ring with #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #0# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #the Water Temple Boss Key# and #an Ice Cavern Compass#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

ZR (Open Grotto).text: Expired Spoiler Log? Don't worry! The OoTR Discord staff can help you out.
